name: Tropical Escape Survival Island Saga
description:
Tropical Escape Survival Island Saga from makers of Survival Island games!

Tropical Escape Island Match 3 is a cool and funny three of a kind matching game!
Welcome to the Tropical Island, friends! Your goal now is to match 3 or more of the same type fruits in a row in order to make them disappear. Match sweety juicy fruits, make them fall into oblivion and unlock new levels to enjoy!

HOW TO PLAY:
Slide to manipulate fruit tiles.

Tropical Escape Survival Island Saga features:
+ easy to play but you must be a master to collect 3 stars on level!
+ 3 in a row free game  colorful app design !
+ many boosts and levels  cool puzzle for smart kids!
 + collect all kinds of fruits to win the level!
+ no in app payment!
+ get free bonuses in game!
+ many levels and survival islands!

A brain trainer for all family is already here! Tropical Escape Survival Island Saga – a full-blown addiction before you know it!
